mdRecord.dcterms:description: Various diary entries with date, time, and brief description of weather; one entry as early as 2006. Some transcribed here; one has a response. [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]

Time | 4:18 pm | December 4, 2006 | Sunny with high 40° F. | Time 3:11 p.m. April 27, 2013 | Sunny. I'm sleepy!! hate finals | Time 10:14 PM | Oct 2, 2007 | Dark ← HAHA! | Time | 6:55 pm | Dec 15, 2007 | Final Exams | Death Ridden | Time | 17:23 | March 24th, 2014 | Sunny w/ a brisk breeze
